overview: "The artist wishes to create a world of colour and form in which all the contributory elements are in a state of unending flux. The sheer technical difficulty of devising a complex art form of this kind is tremendous.  Within the prescribed limits of space, it is required that everything: colour, form, and direction of movement shall be subject to any conceivable modification.  Many have imagined this universal art-language, this supreme synthesis, but the day of its practical achievement is still very far off."  Adrian Klein - COLOR-MUSIC - 1925
title: No More Normal
